negotiator.qualitymeasures

Class ScenarioMeasures

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.qualitymeasures.ScenarioMeasures

  • public class ScenarioMeasures
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an improved version of the SpaceDistance class by D. Tykhonov. Edit and run the main to automatically createFrom a XML-sheet with the scenario characteristics of all scenarios in the domain file. Note that the current implementation assumes that all domains only have two preference profiles. For future work this could be extended by creating an arraylist of all preference profiles and returning the distances between all possible pairs.
    Author:
    Mark Hendrikx
